demographics.household: Living with Partner or Small Family

common_purchases: Fresh vegetables like kale, onions, and green beans
Lean proteins such as turkey breast
Organic and whole foods like avocados and eggs

dietary_considerations: Focus on lean proteins and fresh produce
balanced_indulgence: Occasional indulgence in convenience snacks and ready-to-eat meals

primary_motivations: Health and Well-being - Prioritizes fresh and organic ingredients
Routine and Habit - Consistent shopping patterns
Quality and Freshness - Prefers high-quality, fresh produce and meats
Nutritional Balance - Maintains a varied and balanced diet
